name: Watch my nucleus
description:
Frantically reassemble an unstable radioactive nucleus before your manager returns to the lab. A short 3 minute experience that can be played with only a mouse made for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam by Austin and Joseph! Download WindowsBuild for best experience!

Controls
  • Use the mouse to click and drag particles
How to play
  • Drag all the particles back into the nucleus before time runs out
  • Combine the protons(p) and neutrons(n) into alpha(a) particles before you can put them into the nucleus
  • Gamma(y) and electrons(e) can be put straight into the nucleus
